Database¶

The singleton database connection. Every action of database would create a new connection if no connection is created before or use the exis- ted one.

Also the decorator catch all raised exception during the connection. Once a exception is raised, it logs an error message and sends alert emails to all users in the alert list.

To use the connection in the function, you should decorate your function w- ith get_connection

@classmethod
@get_connection
def your_function(cls, connection, *args):
    pass

Note

The decorated function must be a class method!

Methods¶

database.get_connection(function)[source]¶

The decorator with a singleton connection of database.
